Package entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
InteractiveTile, MON_GreenSlime, MON_Mage, NPC_Oldman, OBJ_Axe, OBJ_Boots, OBJ_Chest, OBJ_Coin_Bronze, OBJ_Door, OBJ_Heart, OBJ_Key, OBJ_ManaCrystal, OBJ_NoWep, OBJ_Potion_Red, OBJ_Shield_Blue, OBJ_Shield_Wood, OBJ_StrongAxe, OBJ_Sword_Normal, Particle, Player, Projectile
public class Entity extends Object
class entity defines all monsters, player characters and npc's characteristics, behaviors, actions and attributes
Author:
mrish, Oomar, Sadiyah

    • generateParticle

      public void generateParticle(Entity generator, Entity target)
      This method generates particles when attacking or receiving attacks. uses the class particle to instantiate objects particle, and method add to add them to the gamepanel

    • update

      public void update()
      This method uses collision checker, to check whether an entity is making contact with another no collision allows movement

    • damagePlayer

      public void damagePlayer(int attack)
      This method calculated damage given to a player
      Parameters:
      attack - is the attack of the entity attacking the player

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      This uses the package Graphics2D to draw entity graphics onto the map
      Parameters:
      g2 - is the graphics object from class Graphics2D used to display graphics

    • changeAlpha

      public void changeAlpha(Graphics2D g2, float alphaValue)
      This uses the package Graphics2D to make a graphic object on the screen appear transparent depending on alphaValue
      Parameters:
      g2 - is the graphics object from class Graphics2D used to display graphics
      alphaValue - is the alpha value from 0-255 of the graphics

    • setup

      public BufferedImage setup(String imagePath, int width, int height)
      This method reads an image from an entity subclass and loads it
      Parameters:
      imagePath - is the skeletal path of the image to be loaded
      width - , height are the size parameters of the picture

    • getDetected

      public int getDetected(Entity user, Entity[] target, String targetName)
